name: Final Plea
description:
The year is 2402; overpopulation has made food, water, and other resources hard to come by, forcing some parts of the world to take drastic measures. All crimes are punishable by death, and people are put into place to determine whether these criminals deserve to be put to death or if they should walk free. Read their casefile, listen to their final plea, and decide. Will any of them change your mind?

Inspired by: Papers, Please

Trigger Warning: Brief mentions of sexual assault, animal abuse, and child pornography.

Created in under 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022

Written by April Bub

Programmed by Logan Lang using the Godot game engine

Music by Chip James

Character portraits provided by craftpix.net
